attributes.action: Ban drivers to park in front of your driveway that you have paid council £745
attributes.additional_details: This issue must be dealt with as this mostly certainly must be the route of the neighbour issues and help reduce police time for domestic disputes. I have this issue. Police wont do anything and its £10,000 for a civil action which folk can ill afford. To many rules and police fob you off.
attributes.background: I would like the government to look at the Rules around people parking in front of your driveway and the rules around not having right of access to your property after having paid the local council £745 for privilege to do a drop kerb.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320633
